name: HugeSpace_jam_version
description:
This game has been developed for contest 'break a leg 3' for game-develop site kolenka.su.
It's a short relax game with seamless random-generated space. You - a satellite, what need collect space garbage. Just flying into space, collect circles and not colliding with planets.

Enjoy the space!

Press H for help.
Thanks to XitilonHD for music and bfxr for sounds!
